name: Charitable Chaos
description: The suits are closing in! Mariner's extra-occupational activities are the focus of a Starfleet investigation, just in time for her to be arranging a shipment to Andoria for…agriculture and stuff. Help Mariner make her delivery without getting caught!
rules:
-- Unique Supply Missions are available during the event. Open the Event to access them.
-- Using Insubordinate Mariner, Ransom, Rutherford, Nog, or Crafty crew will provide a bonus to Supply Missions.
-- Every Supply Mission you complete earns you Event Victory Points. Collect Event Victory Points to unlock Threshold Rewards!
-- Community Rewards are only available during Phase 1. Collect Event Victory Points to unlock these rewards before the phase change!
-- In this event, Squadrons may also compete to advance up the Squadron leaderboards. Join a Squadron to get more rewards!
bonus_text: Crew Bonus: Insubordinate Mariner, Ransom, Rutherford, Nog, or Crafty
rewards_teaser: Reach Rank 1 by gaining Victory Points from Event Supply Missions!

featured_crew.name: Badgey
featured_crew.flavor: Corrupted by his creator’s abuse, Badgey seeks revenge on Rutherford and those he cares about.

action.name: Can I Teach You A Lesson?

featured_crew.name: Rutherford
featured_crew.flavor: Rutherford uses his custom holodeck program to help Tendi learn how to spacewalk. Lessons were learned.

rewards.name: Chronitons
rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

rewards.name: Rutherford
rewards.flavor: Rutherford loves being an engineer, and spends his free time talking about how great the Cerritos is with Tendi.

rewards.name: Training
rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

rewards.name: Chronitons
rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

rewards.name: Credits
rewards.flavor: Credits are the galaxy's standard currency. Use Credits in the Time Portal to enlist crew members, build items, and more.

rewards.flavor: Use to instantly revive a failed Voyage.

rewards.name: ISM
rewards.flavor: ISM, or interstellar medium, is the matter that exists between astronomical objects. It can be manipulated by the Q to facilitate crew retrieval. ISM can be obtained from Daily Log-in Rewards, Campaigns and participating in Fleet activities.

rewards.flavor: Dilithium is your most valuable asset. Use Dilithium in the Time Portal to acquire valuable crew members, items, and more.

rewards.name: Badgey
rewards.flavor: Corrupted by his creator’s abuse, Badgey seeks revenge on Rutherford and those he cares about.

action.name: Can I Teach You A Lesson?

rewards.name: Rarity
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 5 Polestars: Common, Uncommon, Rare, Super rare, Legendary

rewards.name: ISM
rewards.flavor: ISM, or interstellar medium, is the matter that exists between astronomical objects. It can be manipulated by the Q to facilitate crew retrieval. ISM can be obtained from Daily Log-in Rewards, Campaigns and participating in Fleet activities.

rewards.name: Dilithium
rewards.flavor: Dilithium is your most valuable asset. Use Dilithium in the Time Portal to acquire valuable crew members, items, and more.

rewards.name: Honor
rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

rewards.name: Merits
rewards.flavor: Merits can be earned by completing missions. Use Merits to acquire faction-based rewards, upgrades to your ship, and more.

adventures.name: Off My Tail
adventures.description: Alter your starship's codes to disguise your location.

adventures.name: Did That Box Just Sneeze?
adventures.description: Analyze the package for signs of life.

adventures.name: Handle With Care
adventures.description: Securely store the package to avoid contamination.

adventures.name: The Goods
adventures.description: Deliver Mariner's package to her pals on Andoria.

rewards.name: Charitable Chaos
rewards.flavor: Event Victory Points

adventures.name: Handle With Care
adventures.description: Securely store the package to avoid contamination.

adventures.name: Did That Box Just Sneeze?
adventures.description: Analyze the package for signs of life.

adventures.name: The Goods
adventures.description: Deliver Mariner's package to her pals on Andoria.

rewards.name: Charitable Chaos
rewards.flavor: Event Victory Points

rewards.name: Rutherford
rewards.flavor: Rutherford uses his custom holodeck program to help Tendi learn how to spacewalk. Lessons were learned.

rewards.name: 10x Portal
rewards.flavor: 10 valuable items. Go to Time Portal to collect!

goals.flavor: Keep a low profile with the Cardassians.
Pay back an old debt with the Romulan Star Empire.
Slip around in the shadows with Section 31.

screens.text: "Hey there, Captain. You know, I was just looking for someone who recently got passed up for a citation of Conspicuous Gallantry and I think you might just fit the bill!"

"See, Starfleet's been on my ass lately. You swap one shipment of synthale with bloodwine and all the sudden, it's 'an embarrassment to Starfleet' this and 'disrespecting the Prophets' that. You'd think I played marbles with the Tears of the Prophets or something."

"Anyway, I don't have time to wait for the bosses to get off my tail. That's where you come in. I have some friends on Andoria waiting on a little shipment from me. For...uh...agriculture-y, science-y something-or-other. Anyway, I need you to get it over there for me. Sound good?"
"Hey there, Captain. You know, I was just looking for someone who recently got passed up for a citation of Conspicuous Gallantry and I think you might just fit the bill!"

"See, Starfleet's been on my ass lately. You swap one shipment of synthale with bloodwine and all the sudden, it's 'an embarrassment to Starfleet' this and 'disrespecting the Prophets' that. You'd think I played marbles with the Tears of the Prophets or something."

"Anyway, I don't have time to wait for the bosses to get off my tail. That's where you come in. I have some friends on Andoria waiting on a little shipment from me. For...uh...agriculture-y, science-y something-or-other. Anyway, I need you to get it over there for me. Sound good?"
